prompts: Create a ghost-type Pokemon that resembles a floating appliance with vibrant colors.
I want a unique Electric-type Pokemon with a playful personality and a quirky design.
Generate a small, agile Pokemon that has a mix of orange and blue hues.
Make a Pokemon that can change forms, incorporating elements of technology and nature.
Imagine a cute, mischievous Pokemon that blends electrical abilities with a ghostly appearance.
Design a Pokemon that can inhabit urban environments and has a friendly disposition.
Show me a Pokemon that embodies both Electric and Ghost traits, with a distinctive shape.
